scenes.background: You agreed to prioritize the urgent task but mentioned you can't delay your other commitments. As you're juggling your tasks, [Monica] messages you again, 'Are you still working on the urgent task? We need to update the team on the progress.'
scenes.description: 'Are you still working on the urgent task? We need to update the team on the progress.'

options.text: I'm working on it, but it's taking longer than expected. I'll update the team soon.
